title: Casa Hood
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A lively art cafe that serves no red meat. Approximately 50% of the plates are vegetarian with several main plates being vegan or adaptable, marked. Some appetizers are also vegan. Has Wi-Fi, a book exchange and rental, movies daily. Mr. Hood is a native English speaker; English is on the menu.
streetAddress: Calle Luis A. Martinez y Eloy Alfaro, Correo Central
